reviews.review: This movie was the most incredible thing I have ever seen. It kept its intensity from start to finish with out ever slowing down and I'm still shaken from it. Fantasic job to the entire cast and crew and just everyone involved. Go see this movie. You will not be disappointed.

As a pop culture enthusiast (nerd) I came ready for this movie to be a rough ride for the Avengers.   After all, Thanos is a villain unlike any seen before.  Still, I figured that I had a pretty good idea of where this all would go.   Turn after turn, the Russo brothers blew my mind.  In Star Wars when luke said in a preview "This isn't going to go the way you think" he was exactly right in all the wrong ways.   In Infinity Wars, that statement was exactly right in all the right ones.   This is a 10/10 must see film for any Marvel fan.
ahhhhh I need to know what happens next!!!!! the next one can't come soon enough üòî
Best movie so far! I was deceased!
Yes, there were a lot of stories and big names to follow, but the flow of the movie was incredible. A true MCU masterpiece.

This movie does a phenomenal job of organically bringing together so many characters in a way that makes sense to the story. The action scenes are brilliant, the dialogue is so well-written, and we are given a villain whom we both empathize with and hate at the same time. Calling this a jumbled mess, too much, or over-the-top, is a complete disservice. If you love the MCU and the characters it has brought us, you will love this film. The Russo brothers do a beautiful job of providing character depth, sharing screen time, and giving everyone their time to shine. A true masterpiece.

Possibly one of the best movies I have seen in a decade!  It had a lot of big names and the performance and directing was really spot on.  I have not had a super hero movie that has affected me emotionally ups and downs as much as this movie has.

Infinity War is the best Marvel movie made. I've been disinterested in Marvel movies for a while now. There has been a distinct lack of risk and consequence of the Marvel characters that returns here.
It all led up to this and it was amazing
